meanings.definition: The start of a game or event where a player kicks the ball to begin play.
meanings.sent1: During the soccer match, the kickoffs were always exciting moments for the fans.
meanings.sent2: The referee blew the whistle to signal the kickoffs of the game.
meanings.sent3: At the beginning of the match, the kickoffs felt like a burst of energy on the field.
meanings.sent4: The kickoffs were like the opening notes of a symphony, setting the tone for the game.
meanings.sent5: The kickoffs marked the official start of the competition, sparking cheers from the crowd.

meanings.definition: The act of starting or initiating something.
meanings.sent1: Her speech was the kickoff for the fundraising campaign.
meanings.sent2: The kickoff of the project was met with enthusiasm from the team.
meanings.sent3: The kickoff of the meeting was delayed due to technical difficulties.
meanings.sent4: The kickoff of the new initiative brought a sense of excitement to the office.
meanings.sent5: The kickoff of the event set the stage for a successful day ahead.
